ygData.subject: Re: New Character!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius went down into the water when his systems locked up from the blast, he s probably about 20,000 leagues under the sea singing with the fishes. Prebon

Ignatius went down into the water when his systems locked up from the 
blast, he's probably about 20,000 leagues under the sea singing with 
the fishes.

Prebon takes off after Starlight knowing that reinforcements would be 
coming soon. without Blaze's disruptor communications was once again 
possible. As he lifted off he was hit by various shots from Astral 
slowing down his liftoff. The trainer leader opened a link to his 
assailant. "You have a choice to make, either keep attacking me and 
lose your prize or go catch it. What would your mighty leader say if 
you lost the bot that your friend was carrying?" He already knew the 
answer so he didn't expect a reply. He let his weapons do the talking 
and fired two missles at Astral and five more blasts from his rifle, 
three at Starlight and two at the new bot. (Ruthless ain't I)

 -- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> And I acctually thought I had a good chance at that :-)
> 
> ::Astral/Starlight/Fenox/Slayer/Havoc::
> 
> Astral swears, opening fire with his rifle at Prebon with a dozen 
> rapid blasts.
> 
> "Someone get that bot off Starlight!" he yells into his comm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Starlight yells as all five shots hit her, making her drop the bot 
> she was carrying, and falling through the air after him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Yes sir," Fenox replies, flying down at Prebon and firing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer flies over the water, looking for any sign of Iguanus, his 
> scanners searching as well (please post where Iguanus is). Havoc 
was 
> pursuing him again, trying to get a lock with his weapons.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OOC I'll see your ploy and raise you a blast.
> > 
> > BIC Prebon  knows that Astral is just a distraction and instead 
> fires 
> > five blasts at Starlight. The trainer leader knows the price that 
> > Zardus would dish out for failure wouldn't be pleasant so the new 
> bot 
> > would be priority for both Astral and Starlight. shoot down the 
one 
> > carrying the bot and the other one would have to take over.
